title: Bitcoin Has Rallied 10% Since Sunday As Geopolitical Tensions Cool
description: Bitcoin prices have climbed roughly 10% since Sunday as global investors respond to cooling geopolitical tensions in the Middle East.
content:
Bitcoin prices have been climbing steadily since reaching a local bottom on Sunday. 
getty
